attributes.action: Stop paying ex prime ministers the £115,000 PDCA
attributes.additional_details: It seems completely useless to give someone money because they have done a job once. Many people have worked hard and have done their job but they don't claim money for it. And to give someone £115,000 a year for less than 7 weeks of work is just ridiculous.
attributes.background: Stop paying ex prime ministers PDCA and spend the money in better places e.g the National Health Service. or atleast lower it to a more reasonable number

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625940
